name: Return the Account Ledger for for an NSC and Account having not located Customer

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have not located a customer

When I search for a ledger with values:
| nsc | account | pageSize | pageNumber | refresh | maxOverallRows |
| 9312921 | 2592106 | 2 | 0 | true | 100 |

children.description: Get ledger: | nsc | account | pageSize | pageNumber | refresh | maxOverallRows | | 9312921 | 2592106 | 2 | 0 | true | 100 |

testSteps.description: Then I should receive an Authorisation Error

title: Return the Account Ledger for for an NSC and Account having not located Customer
